channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 21:19 Air alarm to the Kirovohrad region follow further reports.
item.description: 🔴 21:19 Air alarm to the Kirovohrad region follow further reports.#Kirovograd This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
